basics.name: Kevin Kelly
basics.title: Engineering Manager
basics.summary: Kevin is an experienced software engineer currently solving problems in podcast distribution and monetization. He is focused on growth, both of the individual and the business.

work.name: Spotify
highlights: Manage a remote-oriented team of fullstack engineers focused publishing and monetizing podcasts globally.
Provide system design, planning, and coordination for key cross-organization initiatives.
Migrated providers for database responsible for nearly a billion monthly podcast listens with zero downtime.
Implemented CI/CD pipeline to replicate an existing Platform as a Service deployment strategy into a Kubernetes based strategy.
Active technical contributor in Ruby on Rails, React, and Kubernetes.

work.name: Megaphone
highlights: Lead developer for a customer facing content management system built with ReactJS, Ruby on Rails, and PostgreSQL.
Continuous interfacing with product management, customer experience, and user experience regarding development efforts.
Mentor for JavaScript efforts including UI development and cloud functionality.

work.name: StealthPath, Inc.
highlights: Team lead and lead front-end developer for a cyber-security provisioning application built with ReactJS, GraphQL, NodeJS, and PostgreSQL.
Supervised and mentored web application development efforts for a team of 5 application developers.
Designed and built OSI Layer 2/3/4 filtration functionality in C/C++ to provide network security in both operating system kernel and user space.

work.name: Axios, Inc.
highlights: Lead web developer for a signal processing effort. Developed and maintained the real-time web application for process configuration and analytics.
Lead developer of Ozone IWC, providing web application communication without server middleware.

work.name: Thales Defense and Security, Inc.
highlights: Developed a networked android application for data logging and debugging interfaced devices.
Developed commercial android applications for various device sizes in an agile-based effort.

volunteer.organization: Potomac Falls High School Math Honors Society
highlights: Developed a web application that utilizes QR-scanning for attendance taking.
Built using AngularJS, NodeJS, Express.js, MongoDB (MEAN).
